channel.title: Reference on EpicServer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on EpicServer Documentation

item.title: API Reference
item.description: Detailed documentation of all EpicServer’s public API methods and types.

item.title: Migration Guide
item.description: Learn how to upgrade your application from EpicServer v1.x to v2.x.

item.title: Example Reference
item.description: Reference pages are ideal for outlining how things work in terse and clear terms. Less concerned with telling a story or addressing a specific use case, they should give a comprehensive outline of what your documenting.
